extension.name: Menu Tablet Fixer - Gantry Atom (Helium)
extension.author: Andreas Kar
extension.description:
Menu Tablet Fixer - Atom for Gantry Framework

 Andreas Kar (andreas.kar@gmx.at)

NOTE: This atom is installed for the Gantry Helium.
If you want to install the atom on a different Gantry template, you must manually copy the two files menu-tablet-fixer.yaml and menu-tablet-fixer.html.twig to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles.
Moreover, you have to copy menu-tablet-fixer.js to /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/js.
